subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Corruption (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Valcke, who has been Mr. Blatter’s right-hand man since 2007, said he anticipated that the next president of world soccer’s governing body would name a new secretary general.
snippet: Mr. Valcke, who has been Mr. Blatter’s right-hand man since 2007, said he anticipated that the next president of world soccer’s governing body would name a new secretary general.
